WRITING.TEXT: I remember this music video from my childhood. It's weird, it's one of a handful of memories I have from my early years (I loved this song as young child) and although I completely forgot that the guy with Paul Simon was Chevy Chase and that for some reason I pictured in my memory Paul Simon as bald and with glasses - that red drum - that freaking red drum - was EXACTLY how I remembered it since I last saw this video when I was maybe 4 years old. Shape, size and color. What a trippy nostalgic experience.
